name: .VFS File Extension
summary: Learn about .VFS files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: Typically, VFS files are not meant to be opened. However, some VFS files, including the .HPIMAGE.VFS file, can be mounted within VFAT file systems using the Linux mount command with the -o loop option.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
